meanings.sent1: The speedy horse outtrotted all the others in the race.
meanings.sent2: She outtrotted her friends during their morning jog.
meanings.sent3: The tortoise outtrotted the hare in the unexpected race.
meanings.sent4: His determination outtrotted his fatigue as he reached the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The champion outtrotted the competition with ease.

meanings.sent1: The young foal outtrotted its older siblings in playfulness.
meanings.sent2: The athlete outtrotted his personal best time in the marathon.
meanings.sent3: The cat outtrotted the dog in a playful chase around the yard.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm outtrotted her lack of experience in the race.
meanings.sent5: The dancer outtrotted her previous performance with grace and skill.
